ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE STEPHEN D. HILLIER, a Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of Alberta, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on February 1, 2024.
